ygData.subject: Re: Grim Aura
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I am only 2nd lvl and I wanted a opinion on race too, I am a dark elf and yeah KOS sucks, but I can get that better through work right?  I might restart
ygData.messageBody:
Well I am only 2nd lvl and I wanted a opinion on race too, I am a dark elf
and yeah KOS sucks, but I can get that better through work right? I might
restart the char after hearing from you. I have 130 int and I put the rest
in dex . . . is the Euidite or Gnome a better choice? And how KOS
prone are Gnome Necromancers or Euridites?


Thanks . ..

P.S. any gnome necros get KOS by dwarves or high elves wood elves or
humans?

Thanks


>
> personally ive liked even the idea of the necro when i heard about it
while
> eq was still in development. i have to say i like the class, and we
really
> do have many advantages that other classes dont get. the ability to heal
> ourselves in combat while doing DD is very good, as is having a pet skel.
> our mastery over the undead is great too. the only bad thing is getting
KOS
> by a great deal of npc's, but there has to be a trade-off somewhere.
>
> other classes i was looking at for a second character was either a druid
or
> a shaman- both seem to have a pretty broad base of spells. an enchanter
may
> also be good, but i havent decided =)
>
> belphenor
>
>
> >From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
> >
> >I have a wizard who is 14th and I just started a necro and am 2nd lvl. ..
> >
> >I think Necromancer may be the way to go but I would like to hear your
> >opinions, how is the high lvl Necro stuff going? Can you hold your
own???
> >I like my 14th lvl wizard and I think I might just use both classes but
I'd
> >like to hear input . . .
> >
> >Thanks!
> >
>
>
